main_visualization.description: Central swarm bus backbone connecting three cluster nodes, each cluster showing 4 house nodes as smaller circles. Power flow arrows between clusters. Glowing connections indicate active power transfer.

elements.name: SWARM BUS
elements.visual: horizontal glowing line at top, 1000m backbone

elements.name: CLUSTER A
elements.visual: node with 4 smaller house nodes below, gateway connector to swarm bus

elements.name: CLUSTER B
elements.visual: node with 4 smaller house nodes below, gateway connector to swarm bus

elements.name: CLUSTER C
elements.visual: node with 4 smaller house nodes below, gateway connector to swarm bus

elements.name: power_flow_arrows
elements.visual: animated arrows showing: Cluster B → Cluster A (2.1kW), Cluster B → Cluster C (1.5kW)

panels.title: POWER FLOW — 24H
panels.description: Time series graph showing power production (green area above zero) and consumption (red area below zero) over 24 hours. Solar peak visible at midday.

panels.title: STORAGE — 180kWh TOTAL
panels.visual: 12 vertical battery bars arranged in 3 groups of 4, each bar showing fill level with gradient from red (empty) to green (full)

panels.title: CELL VOLTAGES — 192 CELLS
panels.description: 12x16 grid of small squares, each representing one cell. Color coded: green (3.2-3.3V), yellow (3.1-3.2V or 3.3-3.4V), red (<3.0V or >3.5V). Most cells green, a few yellow scattered.
